admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
trustfund:
TF026814-PHRD-FYR MACEDONIA: HEALTH
            SECTOR DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Government of Macedonia's
            higher level objectives are economic development, poverty
            reduction and the promotion of social stability and harmony.
            By addressing the important issue cost-containment while
            improving quality and access, the Health Sector Management
            Project will contribute to these higher-level objectives.
            The specific objectives of  this project are: (i) to upgrade
            the capacity of the Ministry of Health and the Health
            Insurance Fund to formulate and effectively implement health
            policies, health insurance, financial management and
            contracting of providers; and (ii) to develop and implement
            an efficient scheme of  restructuring of  hospital services
            with emphasis on developing day-care services and shifting
            to primary care. The project consists of four components.
            Component 1 supports policy formulation and implementation,
            specifically, Support to overall Health Policy and Strategy
            Development, public relations and communications, and
            improvement of the Ministry of Health's management and
            business process Component 2 strengthens governance and
            management of the Health Insurance Fund,, establishing
            eligibility criteria and a revenue collection system, and
            strengthening management processes, as well as improving the
            design and implementation of payment models and contracts,
            building staff capacity in areas relevant to purchasing,
            improving the management of drugs, and ensuring better
            tendering processes. Component 3 improves service delivery
            through supporting hospital management and improving primary
            care, and establishes a grant facility to improve service
            quality and efficiency. Component 4 supports project
            management and monitoring.
